sendMail

public static void sendMail(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> receivers,
                            java.lang.String subject,
                            java.lang.String body,
                            java.lang.String attachmentName,
                            java.lang.String attachmentContent)
                     throws javax.mail.internet.AddressException,
                            javax.mail.MessagingException,
                            java.io.IOException
Send mail according to given arguments

Parameters:
username - gmail username ex: "name.surname@gmail.com"
password - gmail password
receivers - list of receivers as mail ex: "name.surname@mail.com"
subject - mail subject
body - mail body
attachmentName - name of attachment
attachmentContent - content of the attachment
Throws:
javax.mail.internet.AddressException
javax.mail.MessagingException
java.io.IOException
